short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens video in video tag in new window (using source code)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In easy way this extension just open video on page for you.

This Extensions finds on page tag <video> and then open it in new tab.
